base_description: Rectangular cabinet, medium size, white color, modern style.
part_description: Features two drawers on top and two doors below. Handles on each drawer and door. Rectangular shape with flat top surface.
internal_interaction_description: Drawers slide in and out within the cabinet frame, allowing access to storage space. Doors swing open on hinges, providing access to interior shelving for additional storage. Handles facilitate easy opening and closing of drawers and doors.
external_interaction_description: Cabinet can be placed against a wall in a room, providing storage space for various items. Users interact by opening drawers and doors to store or retrieve items. The flat top can support additional objects, such as decorative items or small appliances.
